thread.section_title: Travelopod Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelopod | travelopod.com
thread.title: Hajera Yamani

author: Hajera Yamani
title: Hajera Yamani
text: I recently purchased air ticket from Dallas to Hyderabad. It was my first time dealing with Travelopod and I was skeptical about their services. During reservation, seat confirmation and air ticket purchasing I had pleasant experience. I will always remember service of Ammy Brown. I find her to be courteous, caring and customer oriented. She provided exemplary service and because her I will be recommending Travelopod to all my friends.
